dialog.speaker: Ana
dialog.spanish: ¿A qué hora te levantas, Pablo?
dialog.english: What time do you get up, Pablo?

dialog.speaker: Pablo
dialog.spanish: Yo me levanto a las siete de la mañana. Me ducho y desayuno.
dialog.english: I get up at seven in the morning. I shower and have breakfast.

dialog.speaker: Ana
dialog.spanish: Yo me levanto un poco más tarde, a las ocho.
dialog.english: I get up a little later, at eight.

dialog.speaker: Pablo
dialog.spanish: ¿Qué comes en el desayuno?
dialog.english: What do you eat for breakfast?

dialog.speaker: Ana
dialog.spanish: Como pan con café. Siempre bebo café.
dialog.english: I eat bread with coffee. I always drink coffee.

dialog.speaker: Luis
dialog.spanish: ¿Qué haces por la tarde, Sofía?
dialog.english: What do you do in the afternoon, Sofía?

dialog.speaker: Sofía
dialog.spanish: Después de la escuela, a veces hago ejercicio en el gimnasio.
dialog.english: After school, sometimes I exercise at the gym.

dialog.speaker: Luis
dialog.spanish: Eso es bueno. Yo hago mi tarea.
dialog.english: That's good. I do my homework.

dialog.speaker: Sofía
dialog.spanish: Y tú, ¿ves la tele?
dialog.english: And you, do you watch TV?

dialog.speaker: Luis
dialog.spanish: Sí, a veces veo la tele por la noche, no por la tarde.
dialog.english: Yes, sometimes I watch TV at night, not in the afternoon.

questions.question: ¿Qué hace Sofía a veces por la tarde?

dialog.speaker: María
dialog.spanish: ¿Qué haces por la noche, Carlos?
dialog.english: What do you do at night, Carlos?

dialog.speaker: Carlos
dialog.spanish: Yo leo un libro antes de dormir. Me gusta mucho leer.
dialog.english: I read a book before sleeping. I really like to read.

dialog.speaker: María
dialog.spanish: Qué bien. Yo escucho música y hablo con mis amigos.
dialog.english: How nice. I listen to music and talk with my friends.

dialog.speaker: Carlos
dialog.spanish: ¿A qué hora te acuestas?
dialog.english: What time do you go to bed?

dialog.speaker: María
dialog.spanish: Yo me acuesto a las once. A veces, me acuesto más tarde.
dialog.english: I go to bed at eleven. Sometimes, I go to bed later.

questions.question: ¿A qué hora se acuesta María normalmente?

dialog.speaker: Javier
dialog.spanish: ¿Cómo es tu día de trabajo, Laura?
dialog.english: How is your work day, Laura?

dialog.speaker: Laura
dialog.spanish: Mi día es muy ocupado. Yo trabajo de nueve a cinco.
dialog.english: My day is very busy. I work from nine to five.

dialog.speaker: Javier
dialog.spanish: Yo también. ¿Qué haces para el almuerzo?
dialog.english: Me too. What do you do for lunch?

dialog.speaker: Laura
dialog.spanish: Yo como el almuerzo en la oficina. Mi compañera y yo comemos juntas.
dialog.english: I eat lunch in the office. My coworker and I eat together.

dialog.speaker: Javier
dialog.spanish: Eso es bueno. Yo como solo en mi escritorio.
dialog.english: That's good. I eat alone at my desk.

questions.question: ¿Qué significa 'trabajo de nueve a cinco'?
options: I work at nine to five
I work at nine and five

dialog.speaker: Elena
dialog.spanish: ¿Qué haces los fines de semana, Marcos?
dialog.english: What do you do on weekends, Marcos?

dialog.speaker: Marcos
dialog.spanish: Los sábados yo me levanto tarde. Cocino con mi familia.
dialog.english: On Saturdays I get up late. I cook with my family.

dialog.speaker: Elena
dialog.spanish: ¡Qué bien! Yo hago ejercicio por la mañana y luego leo un libro.
dialog.english: How nice! I exercise in the morning and then read a book.

dialog.speaker: Marcos
dialog.spanish: ¿Y el domingo?
dialog.english: And on Sunday?

dialog.speaker: Elena
dialog.spanish: El domingo, mi familia y yo vamos al parque y vemos una película por la noche.
dialog.english: On Sunday, my family and I go to the park and watch a movie at night.

questions.question: ¿Qué hace Marcos los sábados por la mañana?
¿Qué hace Elena el domingo por la noche?

sentences.spanish: Todos los días, yo me levanto a las siete de la mañana.
sentences.english: Every day, I get up at seven in the morning.

sentences.spanish: Después de ducharme y vestirme, yo desayuno.
sentences.english: After showering and getting dressed, I have breakfast.

sentences.spanish: Por la mañana, yo trabajo en la oficina.
sentences.english: In the morning, I work in the office.

sentences.spanish: Mi trabajo es muy interesante.
sentences.english: My job is very interesting.

sentences.spanish: Por la tarde, yo regreso a casa y cocino la cena.
sentences.english: In the afternoon, I return home and cook dinner.

sentences.spanish: A veces, yo veo la tele después de comer.
sentences.english: Sometimes, I watch TV after eating.

sentences.spanish: Antes de dormir, yo leo un libro.
sentences.english: Before sleeping, I read a book.

sentences.spanish: Yo me acuesto a las diez de la noche.
sentences.english: I go to bed at ten at night.

sentences.spanish: Así es mi rutina diaria.
sentences.english: This is my daily routine.

sentences.spanish: El fin de semana es diferente.
sentences.english: The weekend is different.

sentences.spanish: El sábado, yo me levanto tarde, a las nueve.
sentences.english: On Saturday, I get up late, at nine.

sentences.spanish: Mi hermana y yo desayunamos en un café.
sentences.english: My sister and I have breakfast at a cafe.

sentences.spanish: Por la tarde, nosotros hacemos ejercicio o vamos al cine.
sentences.english: In the afternoon, we exercise or go to the cinema.

sentences.spanish: Por la noche, cenamos con nuestra familia.
sentences.english: At night, we have dinner with our family.

sentences.spanish: El domingo es un día tranquilo.
sentences.english: Sunday is a calm day.

sentences.spanish: Mi hermano y yo leemos un poco o escuchamos música.
sentences.english: My brother and I read a little or listen to music.

sentences.spanish: El fin de semana es mi parte favorita de la semana.
sentences.english: The weekend is my favorite part of the week.

sentences.spanish: Sofía es estudiante de universidad. Ella tiene un día muy ocupado.
sentences.english: Sofía is a university student. She has a very busy day.

sentences.spanish: Por la mañana, ella estudia en la biblioteca.
sentences.english: In the morning, she studies at the library.

sentences.spanish: Su clase empieza a la una de la tarde.
sentences.english: Her class starts at one in the afternoon.

sentences.spanish: Ella come el almuerzo con sus amigos en la cafetería de la escuela.
sentences.english: She eats lunch with her friends at the school cafeteria.

sentences.spanish: Por la noche, ella trabaja en un café para ganar dinero.
sentences.english: At night, she works at a cafe to earn money.

sentences.spanish: Ella se acuesta muy tarde, a las once o doce.
sentences.english: She goes to bed very late, at eleven or twelve.

sentences.spanish: A veces, ella está muy cansada.
sentences.english: Sometimes, she is very tired.

sentences.spanish: Pero ella es una persona muy trabajadora.
sentences.english: But she is a very hardworking person.

speaking.title: Actividades Diarias
speaking.description: Preguntas y respuestas sobre las actividades de la rutina diaria, incluyendo la mañana, tarde y noche.

question.english: What time do you get up?

answer.spanish: Yo me levanto a las siete de la mañana.
answer.english: I get up at seven in the morning.

question.english: What do you eat for breakfast?

answer.spanish: Yo como pan y café.
answer.english: I eat bread and coffee.

question.spanish: ¿Te duchas por la mañana o por la noche?
question.english: Do you shower in the morning or at night?

answer.spanish: Yo me ducho por la mañana.
answer.english: I shower in the morning.

question.english: Do you work or study?

answer.spanish: Yo trabajo en una oficina.
answer.english: I work in an office.

question.english: What time do you eat lunch?

answer.spanish: Yo como el almuerzo a la una de la tarde.
answer.english: I eat lunch at one in the afternoon.

question.english: Do you watch TV at night?

answer.spanish: Sí, a veces veo la tele por la noche.
answer.english: Yes, sometimes I watch TV at night.

question.spanish: ¿Qué hace tu amigo por la tarde?
question.english: What does your friend do in the afternoon?

answer.spanish: Él hace ejercicio en el gimnasio.
answer.english: He exercises at the gym.

question.spanish: ¿Qué hace ella en su tiempo libre?
question.english: What does she do in her free time?

answer.spanish: Ella lee libros.
answer.english: She reads books.

question.english: Do you cook dinner?

answer.spanish: Sí, yo cocino la cena todos los días.
answer.english: Yes, I cook dinner every day.

question.english: What time do you go to bed?

answer.spanish: Yo me acuesto a las diez de la noche.
answer.english: I go to bed at ten at night.

question.spanish: ¿Qué hacen ellos los fines de semana?
question.english: What do they do on weekends?

answer.spanish: Ellos van al parque.
answer.english: They go to the park.

question.spanish: ¿Tu hermano se levanta tarde o temprano?
question.english: Does your brother get up late or early?

answer.spanish: Él se levanta tarde los fines de semana.
answer.english: He gets up late on weekends.

question.english: Do you listen to music?

answer.spanish: Sí, a veces escucho música por la noche.
answer.english: Yes, sometimes I listen to music at night.

question.english: What do you all do after work?

answer.spanish: Nosotros vamos a casa.
answer.english: We go home.

question.english: What time do you have dinner?

answer.spanish: Yo ceno a las siete de la noche.
answer.english: I have dinner at seven at night.

question.english: Does your friend exercise?

answer.spanish: Sí, él hace ejercicio por la mañana.
answer.english: Yes, he exercises in the morning.

question.english: Do you sleep a lot?

answer.spanish: Sí, yo duermo ocho horas al día.
answer.english: Yes, I sleep eight hours a day.

question.spanish: ¿Qué hacen tú y tu hermana los sábados?
question.english: What do you and your sister do on Saturdays?

answer.spanish: Nosotras desayunamos en un café.
answer.english: We have breakfast at a cafe.

question.english: Is your day very busy?

answer.spanish: Sí, mi día es muy ocupado.
answer.english: Yes, my day is very busy.

question.english: What do you watch on TV?

answer.spanish: Yo veo películas por la noche.
answer.english: I watch movies at night.
